Floral Baskets Presented to DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Presented to DPRK Missions  
   Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- Political parties, ministries of governments, institutions and organizations and figures from all walks of life in different countries including the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the Ministry of Defence and the Ministry of Public Security of Vietnam, the Joint Chiefs of Staff of the Iranian army, the Ministry of Defence and Armed Forces Logistics of Iran, the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association and the deputy general secretary of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party, the minister of Defence and the minister of Information of Syria, the chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Syria, the director of the Political Department of the Ministry of Defence of Syria and the vice-chairman of the National Democratic Party of Egypt sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions in the countries concerned on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the foundation of the Korean People's Army.

North Side's Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
North Side's Delegation Leaves  
   Pyongyang, April 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the north side led by Won Hyong Guk, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK), left here by air on April 29 to participate in the May Day pro-reunification meeting of workers from the north and the south of Korea for implementing the June 15 joint declaration to be held in Changwon, South Kyongsang Province of south Korea.

Big Floral Basket and Congratulatory Message to DPRK Embassy in Jakarta
articles.content:
Big Floral Basket and Congratulatory Message to DPRK Embassy in Jakarta
   Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Megawati Soekarnoputri, former president of Indonesia and chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, sent a big floral basket and a congratulatory message to the DPRK embassy in Jakarta on April 23 on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the foundation of the Korean People's Army.

articles.content:
Secretary of C.C., WPK Meets Iranian Delegation
   Pyongyang, April 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Iran Parties House led by Yadollah Tahernejad, first vice-president of its Central Council, on Saturday.
